DOC.brief_summary: This study is to verify the efficacy of fluvoxamine maleate given for 8 weeks in the treatment of children and adolescents with depression or depressive state
DOC.brief_title: Fluvoxamine Maleate in the Treatment of Depression/Depressive State : A Post-marketing Clinical Study in Children and Adolescents
